column3: NISM Series I: Currency Derivatives Certification Examination
column4: Exam covering the principles and operations of currency derivatives markets, focusing on regulatory framework, pricing, and risk management.
column7: NISM Series I: Currency Derivatives Certification Examination

column3: NISM Series II A: Registrars to an Issue and Share Transfer Agents - Corporate
column4: NISM certification for corporate share transfer agents covering share transfer processes, regulations and compliance.
column7: NISM Series II A: Registrars to an Issue and Share Transfer Agents - Corporate

column3: NISM Series II B: Registrars to an Issue and Share Transfer Agents - Mutual Fund
column4: Certification focusing on registrar and transfer operations in mutual funds, regulatory requirements, and best practices.

column3: NISM Series III A: Securities Intermediaries Compliance (Non-Fund)
column4: Exam on compliance requirements for securities intermediaries (excluding funds), covering rules, risk controls, and market conduct.
column7: NISM Series III A: Securities Intermediaries Compliance (Non-Fund)

column3: NISM Series IV: Interest Rate Derivatives Certification Examination
column4: Certification exam emphasizing interest rate derivatives, their pricing, trading strategies, and regulatory environment.

column3: NISM Series VA: Mutual Fund Distributors Certification Examination
column4: Certification for mutual fund distributors covering fundamentals of mutual funds, products, taxation and distribution practices.

column3: NISM Series VB: Mutual Fund Foundation Certification Examination
column4: Foundation level certification for mutual fund practitioners focusing on basic concepts and investor servicing.

column4: Advanced certification for mutual fund distributors with deeper emphasis on regulations, products, and practical case studies.

column3: NISM Series VI: Depository Operations Certification Examination

column3: NISM Series VII: Securities Operations and Risk Management Certification Examination
column4: Certification covering securities operations, risk management practices and operational controls in securities markets.

column3: NISM Series VIII: Equity Derivatives Certification Examination
column4: Exam focused on equity derivatives markets including instruments, pricing models, trading strategies and regulatory framework.
column7: NISM Series VIII: Equity Derivatives Certification Examination

column3: NISM Series IX: Merchant Banking Certification Examination
column4: Certification for merchant banking professionals covering issues related to capital markets, underwriting, corporate finance and compliance.

column3: NISM Series XA: Investment Adviser (Level 1) Certification Examination
column4: Entry‑level certification for investment advisers focusing on advisory practices, regulatory landscape and ethical responsibilities.

column4: Advanced investment adviser certification with emphasis on financial planning tools, client assessment and portfolio strategies.

column4: Exam covering fundamentals of securities markets, structure, instruments, and regulatory framework.

column4: Exam focusing on retirement planning, products, regulations and adviser practices in long‑term financial planning.

column4: Certification for distributors of alternative investment funds covering products, compliance and market practices.
